ns2:test-suite.name: As a OrangeHRMlive user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with valid credentials

step.name: Given I am on the HRM Login page URL "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login"
step.title: Given I am on the HRM Login page URL "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login"

step.name: Then I should see HRM Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see HRM Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter HRM username as "Admin"
step.title: When I enter HRM username as "Admin"

step.name: And I enter HRM password as "admin123"
step.title: And I enter HRM password as "admin123"

step.name: And click on HRM login button
step.title: And click on HRM login button

step.name: Then I am logged in HRM
step.title: Then I am logged in HRM
